request.description:
This route is used to create user, **only users with product owner role have access to this route.**

_____________________
#### Roles:::

1 => product owner,

2 => developer,

3 => tester
This route is used to update the user, only users with product owner role can perform this action
This route is used to delete the user, only users with product owner role can perform this action
This route is used to log in the user
This route is used to sign up users to the systes, **when a user signed signed up their role is product owner, after the signed up user should go back and login to get the token**
This route is used to log out the user
This route is used to create tasks, and only the user with product owner role can create tasks

urlencoded.description: not required | array, don't send it if u don't want to add sub tasks
required only when the status of the task is NOT TODO
